####### Resource #######

Explanation_Banner_2 = { 3 6 7 13 14 17 22 26 43 86 88 89 90 93 96 100 102 106 112 121 122 126 131 132 133 134 135 136 138 228 292 658 667 672 695 705 731 742 852 925 935 951 1055 1070 1084 1086 1102 1118 1128 1134 1162 1165 1202 1226 1260 1318 1321 1335 1354 1364 1367 1382 1383 1385 1386 1389 1393 1398 1399 1402 1404 1406 1422 1424 1426 1429 1435 1440 1450 1560 1643 1645 1683 1788 1789 1794 1816 1825 1827 1829 1833 1836 1837 1848 1849 1850 1868 1870 1877 1878 1879 1880 1881 1882 1883 1884 1885 1889 1890 1891 1898 1899 1909 1910 1923 1926 1928 1929 1931 1932 1933 1934 1939 1956 1957 1958 1959 1960 1961 1962 1963 1964 1965 1966 1967 1968 1970 1971 1974 1975 1976 1977 1978 1980 1981 1982 1984 1985 1986 1988 1989 1991 1992 1996 2004 2019 2020 2021 2022 2034 2055 2057 2063 2075 2084 2094 2097 2105 2107 2108 2115 2120 2121 2124 2155 2159 2162 2163 2164 2213 2237 2251 2263 2270 2271 2272 2275 2283 2285 2286 2291 2301 2317 2318 2319 2321 2334 2373 2396 2400 2402 2403 2404 2405 2411 2412 2413 2415 2417 2423 2426 2454 2470 2471 2472 2476 2478 2479 2480 2481 2488 2500 2501 2502 2509 2510 2513 2521 2532 2543 2549 2550 2575 2602 2603 2620 2624 2627 2644 2645 2648 2664 3289 3326 3349 3412 3415 3449 3450 3452 3453 3455 3468 3491 3505 3541 3556 3586 3597 3610 3611 } # "Following resources can be developed in this province:"

### Resource States

OIL_STATE_1 = { 22 26 43 89 90 112 126 131 132 133 134 135 136 138 228 667 672 705 852 925 951 1055 1086 1102 1134 1162 1183 1202 1260 1335 1393 1399 1406 1424 1429 1450 1645 1683 2159 2162 2163 2164 2237 2251 2270 2271 2272 2283 2291 2396 2510 2627 3289 3349 3412 3449 3450 3505 3586 } # Oil Provinces
GEMS_STATE_1 = { 1226 1849 1885 1984 2084 2094 2097 2107 2108 3412 } # Gems Provinces
GOLD_STATE_1 = { 3 6 7 13 14 17 86 88 93 96 100 102 106 122 695 1070 1084 1118 1128 1183 1387 1390 1422 1440 1643 1794 1836 1881 1884 1909 1910 1991 2075 2105 2155 2275 2334 2400 2470 2471 2472 2476 2478 2479 2480 2481 2488 2500 2513 2575 2603 2620 2644 2645 2648 3412 3449 3452 3453 3455 3468 3491 3556 3597 } # Gold Provinces
RUBBER_STATE_1 = { 1318 1321 1354 1364 1367 1382 1385 1386 1389 1398 1402 1404 1406 1426 1560 1827 1829 1833 1836 1837 1848 1850 1877 1880 1882 1883 1890 1891 1898 1899 1923 1926 1928 1929 1931 1932 1933 1934 1956 1957 1959 1962 1965 1976 1978 1980 1981 1985 1986 1988 1989 1992 1996 2034 2055 2057 2063 2263 2286 2301 2317 2318 2319 2321 2402 2403 2404 2405 2411 2412 2413 2415 2417 2423 2426 2454 2532 2543 2549 2550 2624 3326 3412 3611 } # Rubber Provinces
PEARLS_STATE_1 = { 935 1162 1165 1167 2488 2501 2502 2602 2664 3412 } # Pearls Provinces
SUGAR_STATE_1 = { 93 106 121 292 658 731 742 1367 1383 1435 1788 1789 1816 1825 1868 1870 1877 1878 1879 1880 1882 1883 1889 1939 1956 1957 1958 1959 1960 1961 1963 1964 1966 1967 1968 1970 1971 1974 1975 1976 1977 1978 1982 2007 2019 2020 2021 2022 2115 2120 2121 2124 2213 2285 2373 2454 2479 2509 2521 2624 3412 3415 3541 3610 3611 } # Sugar Provinces
